name: stg-lunch-gacha-app
description: Client and Functions for Lunch Gacha app.

scripts.build:client: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && esbuild ./index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/main.js --jsx=automatic --loader:.tsx=tsx --loader:.ts=ts --platform=browser --format=esm --define:process.env.APP_VERSION="'"$npm_package_version"'" --minify --external:react --external:react-dom --external:react/* --external:react-dom/*
